timeline.bodyText: reflectiveClass is not used anyway, can be removed?
timeline.author: machi1990

replies.bodyText: Fixed, my bad... copy the signature form another extension.
replies.author: cescoffier

timeline.message:
Fix #6878

Some classes from Vert.x Web must be initialized at runtime. It is due to a change in the Netty native-image configuration that avoid the usage of buffers
at build time. This commit allows using SockJS and the event bus SockJS bridge in  native mode.

Fix #6878

Some classes from Vert.x Web must be initialized at runtime. It is due to a change in the Netty native-image configuration that avoid the usage of buffers
at build time. This commit allows using SockJS and the event bus SockJS bridge in  native mode.
